description:
HotUKDeals.com was founded in August 2004 and quickly became the premier website for UK shoppers to share, rate and converse about the latest and greatest deals on the high street and online. As a place for consumers to freely share deal tips, voucher codes and other consumer information. The purpose of the site is to escape from the marketing messages and ads that surround us and get genuine advice from other people about hot deals.
HUKD webOS is an unofficial portal into that website, allowing you to experience the bargains the way you want to. Filter the deals by type, temperature, online/offline and so on – you this app is a great way to save money and never miss the next killer deal.

Remember the next time you save a fortune with one these deals that HUKD webOS was where you found it!
versionNote:
Better control layout in portrait mode
Expanded help section
Minor bug fixes
